title: Ep140: Online Dating Done Right feat Damona Hoffman & Stacy
itunes:title: Ep140: Online Dating Done Right feat Damona Hoffman & Stacy
description:
This week's episode features dating coach Damona Hoffman and owner of GetLashedLA, Stacy. While Mandii was in LA, she got into the studio to record with a dating expert and relationship coach to discuss how to successfully date online and why so many people are not using the online dating sites effectively. Is your profile keeping you from finding the love of your life? Find out the 3 C's of dating online. Damona Hoffman, a dating coach, TV Personality, and host of the wildly popular podcast, Dates & Mates. In Dates & Mates, Damona Hoffman demystifies modern love with celebrities and experts in dating, marriage, breakups and hookups. You will laugh, you will cry, and you will believe in love again. Follow her on social media: Instagram: @damonahoffman Get $25 off your full set at Get Lashed LA when you mention Whoreible Decisions. Follow @getlashedLA This week's episode was brought to you by Adam and Eve! Adam & Eve- Get 50% almost any one item + 6 free gifts and free shipping. Use Promocode WD50 at checkout. Adamandeve.com Promcode: WD50 Join us at MOCHA FEST 2020 in Negril, JA! Visit mochafest.com and book your room + party package using PROMOCODE: WHOREIBLE to save $50 on booking. Payment plans are available! Can't wait to see you all there! BOSTON 12/12 GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! Whoreible Decisions LIVE is coming to your city! Get your tickets now before they sell out! Get your tickets to see your favorite podcast duo live at whoreibledecisions.com All caught up? Receive 3 bonus episodes plus join the Whorehive community! Get access to pre-sale tickets during the tour and so much more. Become a patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
